rows.label: qst100806_msg0001
rows.name:
Och, it's not often you bump into
someone in a place like this, is it,
Kapha?! Where'd he go...?

rows.label: qst100806_msg0002
rows.name:
Ah, I was so carried away looking for
that Healing Herb, I forgot all about
Kapha.

rows.label: qst100806_msg0003
rows.name:
If he was so worried about me, I don't
know why he didn't just come looking
for me himself.

rows.label: qst100806_msg0004
rows.name: It's not like he can't handle himself...

rows.label: qst100806_msg0005
rows.name:
Ah, I get it!
I suppose he's a bit too careful
to risk climbing!

rows.label: qst100806_msg0006
rows.name:
He's the opposite of me, I guess.
Oh!

rows.label: qst100806_msg0007
rows.name:
The Healing Herb! It's in that little
patch there!

rows.label: qst100806_msg0008
rows.name:
This Healing Herb's a delicate wee
fellow. He sprouts in the morning, but
by the evening, he's withered away.

rows.label: qst100806_msg0009
rows.name:
Now, I know what you're thinking.
"Why don't you just get up early and
pick the herb then," right?

rows.label: qst100806_msg0010
rows.name:
But the nasty thing is, that's
when monsters show up to
scoff 'em all down.

rows.label: qst100806_msg0011
rows.name:
I'm not much of a fighter...
We need Kapha over here...

rows.label: qst100806_msg0012
rows.name:
No point waiting for him though, since
he asked you guys to come get me.

rows.label: qst100806_msg0013
rows.name:
Fighting alone's not great, but needs
must...

rows.label: qst100806_msg0014
rows.name: You'll go and fetch it for me?

rows.label: qst100806_msg0015
rows.name:
But I didn't come all this way not to
fetch it myself...

rows.label: qst100806_msg0016
rows.name:
Ah, maybe I can just slip past
and grab the Healing Herb without
having to fight...

rows.label: qst100806_msg0017
rows.name: Ugh!

rows.label: qst100806_msg0018
rows.name:
If a team of Drivers and their
impressive Blades are warning me
off...

rows.label: qst100806_msg0019
rows.name:
I guess I'd better listen...
Okay, I'd only slow you down, so
I'll just head back.

rows.label: qst100806_msg0020
rows.name: But don't forget the Healing Herb,okay?
